title: Orange Chocolate Bark (Mini-Batch)
directions: Melt 1/4 cup chocolate chips in the microwave in short bursts, stirring between each.
Zest the cutie or dice a few segments very finely.
Stir the zest or diced pieces into the melted chocolate.
Sprinkle with a pinch of salt or chopped nuts.
Chill until firm, then break into shards.
notes: Crunchy and citrusy. A mini-batch bark that is quick to make with minimal ingredients. Great for satisfying a chocolate-orange craving.
